info.name: DNS TXT Record Detected
author: pdteam
info.description: A DNS TXT record was detected. The TXT record lets a domain admin leave notes on a DNS server.

request:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18037
;; flags: rd ad; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;matcha.apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 18037
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 1, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 1232

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;matcha.apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr.	IN	 TXT

;; ANSWER SECTION:
matcha.apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr.	300	IN	TXT	"google-site-verification=W3r_XnZtm_rP_TlvUlJDoVJ4pN-Hd1VCZypFjhFtN0Q"

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: matcha.apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable Connection: close Content-Length: 190 Content-Type: text/html Date: Sun, 18 Sep 2022 18:40:11 GMT Server: nginx 503 Service Temporarily Unavailable

503 Service Temporarily Unavailable

nginx
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: matcha.apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://matcha.apprentissage.beta.gouv.fr/'

info.name: OpenSSH Detection
author: r3dg33k
daffainfo
iamthefrogy
info.description: OpenSSH is the premier connectivity tool for remote login with the SSH protocol. It encrypts all traffic to eliminate eavesdropping, connection hijacking, and other attacks. In addition, OpenSSH provides a large suite of secure tunneling capabilities, several authentication methods, and sophisticated configuration options.

response: SSH-2.0-OpenSSH_8.9p1 Ubuntu-3
